docs.text: Resource for all your IT certifications This website is a living document to help you pass your next certification. To use this website look in the drop down menu to find the certifications you are looking for. We are trying to keep this website us updated as possiable, so if we are missing anything that has help you passed any test, please let us know.
docs.title: Welcome

docs.text: AWS Certified Advanced Networking - Specialty ¶ Overview ¶ Exam Code: ANS-C00 Prerequisites: None Recommended Experience: An AWS associate certification is recommended but not required. Number of Questions: 65 Test Format: Multiple choice, multiple answer Length of Test: 170 minutes Passing Score: Around 70% Test Objectives: ANS-C00 Objectives Cost: $300 Registration: Register Here Expiration: 3 years after the certification is acquired. Renewal: Take the current specialty-level exam Books ¶ Sybex - AWS Certified Advanced Networking Official Study Guide: Specialty Exam Packt Publishing - AWS Certified Advanced Networking - Specialty Exam Guide Videos ¶ Linux Academy - AWS Advanced Networking Specialty Udemy - AWS Certified Advanced Networking - Specialty 2019 - Nitin Sharma A Cloud Guru - AWS Certified Advanced Networking - Specialty 2019 Cloud Academy - AWS Advanced Networking – Specialty Certification Preparation Questions ¶ Wizlabs - AWS Certified Advanced Networking – Specialty Other ¶ AWS Cheat Sheets AWS Whitepapers & Guides

docs.text: A+ ¶ Overview ¶ Exam Code: 220-1001 and 220-1002. Need to pass both exams to earn A+ Prerequisites: None Recommended Experience: None Number of Questions: 90 Test Format: Multiple choice questions (single and multiple response), drag and drops and performance-based Length of Test: 90 minutes Passing Score: 220-1001: 675 (on a scale of 100-900) 220-1002: 700 (on a scale of 100-900) Test Objectives: 220-1001 Objectives and 220-1002 Objectives Cost: $219 Registration: Register Here Expiration: 3 years after the certification is acquired. Renewal: You can either take a higher certification, pass the most current version of the exam, get 20 or more credits of Continuing Education Units in 3 years, or complete CertMaster CE, an online, self-paced CE course. Books ¶ McGraw-Hill - CompTIA A+ Certification All-in-One Exam Guide, Tenth Edition (Exams 220-1001 & 220-1002) Pearson IT - CompTIA A+ Core 1 (220-1001) and Core 2 (220-1002) Exam Cram Videos ¶ Professor Messer’s CompTIA 220-1001 and 220-1002 A+ Training Course CBT Nuggets - CompTIA A+ Udemy - CompTIA A+ 2019 Certification 1001 and 1002 Pluralsight - CompTIA A+ (220-1001 and 220-1002) ITProv.tv - CompTIA A+ Core 2019 (220-1001/220-1002) Questions ¶ ExamCompass CompTIA Practice Exams Pearson IT - CompTIA A+ Practice Questions Exam Cram Core 1 (220-1001) and Core 2 (220-1002) Sybex - CompTIA A+ Complete Practice Tests: Exam Core 1 220-1001 and Exam Core 2 220-1002 Other ¶ CertBlaster - A plus Exam Notes for A+ Exams 220-1001 and 220-1002
